thread.title: Sanford scientist lands grant to support Batten disease research (Sanford Health - Fargo, ND)

author: wn.com
title: Sanford scientist lands grant to support Batten disease research (Sanford Health - Fargo, ND)
text: ( Source : Sanford Health - Fargo, ND ) Dr. Jill Weimer furthers study of rare neurodegenerative disease SIOUX FALLS, S.D. - A Sanford Research scientist has received nearly $ 440 , 000 to support her research of a rare neurodegenerative disease
